price: Kaya hindi sila nakakaya ng pagtayo at hindi sila dati mga naiaadya.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
